description: Built and launched two key WordPress sites to showcase company services. Deployed and configured production-grade server applications. Led full-stack development of an AI chat app with FastAPI and Next.js. Developed CLI and Microservices tools for embedding generation and RedisVL integration. Integrated LLMs for knowledge-driven conversational AI. Improved data extraction workflows using big data principles.
Redesigned the Proplayas.org website with Next.js and TypeScript, improving user experience and reducing loading times by 40%. Delivered a scalable architecture supporting high traffic seamlessly.

Developed a modular e-commerce platform with scalable RESTful APIs and JWT-based authentication, which increased transaction efficiency by 25%. Optimized performance with an MVC/OOP architecture. Frontend in Next.js.
